description: Upadacitinib is used for the treatment of inflammatory bowel disease (IBD).
Risankizumab is used for the treatment of inflammatory bowel disease (IBD).
Upadacitinib is administered to Crohn's disease patients who inadequately respond to anti-TNF-α treatment.
Risankizumab is administered to Crohn's disease patients who inadequately respond to anti-TNF-α treatment.
